title: How to pronounce SON (SUN ) & SONG /sʌn sɑŋ/ -  American English Pronunciation Lesson

json.text:
welcome to the minute of speech this
confusing word pair is a recommendation

from a Spanish speaker from Venezuela
son a male child and song something

people sing to say these words
correctly focus on the short vowel sound
uh and oh and the last sounds  N and NG  to say son started by saying the s sound this is

made by placing your tongue close to but
not touching the top front teeth while

the air moves out of the mouth add the
short uh sound by relaxing your lips and
tongue end with an n by touching the tip of your tongue to the back of your top front

teeth while the air moves through your
nose son

To say song start by saying the s
sound s by placing your tongue close to

but not touching the top front teeth
while the air moves out of the mouth add
the short oh by opening your mouth wide while your tongue

rests in the bottom of your mouth end
with an ng by touching the tip of your

tongue to the back of your bottom front
teeth while the air moves through your

let's try it son son son song song song
son song his son sang a song in the Sun
His son sang a song and the sun
